name: Baldi's Basics 1 1/2: The Adequate School
description:
This is another modified decompile I made, and is the 3rd game in Season 1 of this series.  Some stuff has been fixed, rearranged, and redesigned again like always. If you have ideas, suggestions, or bugs you'd like to report, leave them down in the comments sections below.

Story:

So, a couple of things have changed recently, and Baldi is still keeping his business running. An interesting student named Penny has decided to join the school's science class. This also means that science is also becoming a popular subject in the schoolhouse. Like usual, you must do tasks for people, and collect all of the notebooks.

Let me know what bugs I should fix, or suggestions I could add.
